title: About Me
summary: Undergraduate student in Computer and Artificial Intelligence at Jeonbuk National University.
content: Hi! I'm Sangah Ahn, a student majoring in Computer and Artificial Intelligence at Jeonbuk National University. Currently gaining research experience at the Medical AI & Computational Science Lab.

title: Projects
summary: Portfolio built with HugoBlox & GitHub Pages
content: Developed a multilingual, responsive academic portfolio with CI/CD automation via GitHub Actions. Supports Korean/English localization and SEO optimization.
